item.title: Need some Phonescape help!
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

[center][size=20pt]I have some things I need help with i just got a Phonescape server
I’ve never used Phonescape Please help with these things
If you help me enough you will earn mod to the new server[/size][/center]
[hr][br]First thing I need help with:

public void AddGlobalObj(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60) { person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face, ObjectType); } } } }
How do i add a global object??? its got all that random player stuff

[hr][br]Second thing how do i add a thing up the top that says the player names???

[hr][br]Third and final thing is how do i make my walls Lava

[center][size=15pt]If you can help with any of this Please post![/size][/center]

Read full topic
